T02TD2523E:132b-3: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2523E:132b-4: nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing //
T02TD2523E:132b-5: sems can kun la phan bzhed pa //
T02TD2523E:132b-6: rtag tu dngos po kun rtag 'gyur //
T02TD2523E:132b-7: rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD2523E:132b-8: ji ltar sku gzugs la sogs kyi //
T02TD2523E:132b-9: rab gnas rgyas par bshad par bya //
T02TD2523E:132b-10: rdor 'dzin chen por dbang bskur ba'i //
T02TD2523E:132b-11: slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan pas //
T02TD2523E:132b-12: rigs lnga'i rab gnas bya'o zhes //
T02TD2523E:132b-13: rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pas na //
T02TD2523E:132b-14: de la slob dpon mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD2523E:132b-15: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02TD2523E:132b-16: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu med //
T02TD2523E:133a-3: de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes //
T02TD2523E:133a-4: de dag dang ldan slob dpon te //
T02TD2523E:133a-5: de la de nyid bcu po ni //
T02TD2523E:133a-6: dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin mchog / phyag rgya stang stabs dag dang ni //
T02TD2523E:133a-7: bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de nyid mchod//
T02TD2523E:133a-8: las dang sbyor ba nyer bsdu ba //
T02TD2523E:133a-9: de nyid bcu zhes yongs su grags //
T02TD2523E:133a-10: de la dang por re zhig sngags pa blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
T02TD2523E:133a-13: gza' dang nyi ma bzang po yongs su shes par byas la /
T02TD2523E:133a-16: ba dan la sogs pas gnas brgyan par bya zhing /
T02TD2523E:133a-17: ba'i rnam la lnga la sogs pa la /
T02TD2523E:133a-18: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pas /
T02TD2523E:133a-19: gnas dang dkyil 'khor nye bar byug par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:133a-21: de'i 'og tu rang nyid chu dang dril la sogs pas khrus legs par byas la /
T02TD2523E:133a-22: rgyan btags te cho ga thams cad yongs su spyad par bya ba ste /
T02TD2523E:133a-23: de la dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa dang gzhal yas khang dang gdan la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la //
T02TD2523E:133a-24: 'di ltar yid la 'thad pa'i khrus sa'i stegs bu brtsig par bya ba ni /
T02TD2523E:133a-25: zur bzhi pa la gru bzhi pa'am //
T02TD2523E:133a-26: khru gang tsam gyi tshad tsam ni //
T02TD2523E:133a-27: med na legs par bri bar bya //
T02TD2523E:133a-28: de ltar phyogs dang mtshams su mtshan ma bris pa'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2523E:133a-30: rdo rje me tog la sogs pa bris la /
T02TD2523E:133a-31: phyogs dang mtshams su gzhag par bya zhing /
T02TD2523E:133a-32: dbus su ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rigs lnga'i mtshan mas mtshan pa bzhag la /
T02TD2523E:133a-33: de dag gi nang du 'bru lnga dang /
T02TD2523E:133a-34: sman dang rin po che bcug la //
T02TD2523E:133a-35: dri dang sbyar ba'i chus bkang ste //
T02TD2523E:133a-36: gos kyis mgul pa dkri ba dang //
T02TD2523E:133a-37: 'dab ma dri zhim pos kha brgyan pa dang /
T02TD2523E:133a-40: ba dan la sogs pas mtshan par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:133a-41: de'i rjes la gos dang dril bu sogs pas bskor ba'i khrus kyi khang par rdo rje slob dpon gyis lha rnams khrus gsol bar bya ste /
T02TD2523E:133a-42: lugs ma las gzhan pa ri mo dang glegs bam la sogs pa la ni me long ngam /
T02TD2523E:133b-0: de bzhin @133b gshegs pa'i sku gdung la sogs pa la /
T02TD2523E:133b-1: de'i nang du ting nge 'dzin gyis bkug pa la bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2523E:133b-2: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' la //
T02TD2523E:133b-3: ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2523E:133b-4: de nas aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum mam /
T02TD2523E:133b-5: lha de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:133b-6: de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul la /
T02TD2523E:133b-7: sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:133b-8: zhes bya bas 'dir sbyang ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2523E:133b-9: de'i rjes la kun rdzob kyi lha de dang por dar ram ras dkar po gtsang ma lag bur gyis bsgos pa blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2523E:133b-10: de nas de bkru ba'i 'dag chal dang /
T02TD2523E:133b-11: yo byad rnams ni 'di dag ste //
T02TD2523E:133b-12: sug pa dang ni sran phye dang //
T02TD2523E:133b-13: ku sha ba yi rnam lnga dang //
T02TD2523E:133b-14: de ltar so phag la sogs pas //
T02TD2523E:133b-15: khrus ni bya bar gsungs pa ste//
T02TD2523E:133b-16: yungs kar dang ni me dag gis //
T02TD2523E:133b-17: sems can kun la phan bde ba'o //
T02TD2523E:133b-18: sbyang ba la sogs rnams bya zhing //
T02TD2523E:133b-19: rgyal 'gyur bkra shis tshigs bcad gdon //
T02TD2523E:133b-20: yang dang yang du bstod bya zhing //
T02TD2523E:133b-21: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2523E:133b-22: ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rol mo'ang bya //
T02TD2523E:133b-23: las kun byed dang rigs snying dang //
T02TD2523E:133b-24: rang gi rigs bdag gsang sngags ni //
T02TD2523E:133b-25: yongs bzlas sngar bshad bum pa'i chus //
T02TD2523E:133b-26: mkhas pas lha rnams khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2523E:133b-27: de nas gtsang ba mi yis ni //
T02TD2523E:133b-28: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2523E:133b-29: bzlas byas stan ni bzang po la //
T02TD2523E:133b-30: rigs pa rang gnas bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2523E:133b-31: de nas rigs kyi bdag po'i gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2523E:133b-32: de bzhin du rigs kyi rig pa yongs su bzlas nas bzhugs su gsol nas /
T02TD2523E:133b-33: sngags pas yang rang gi gsang sngags dang //
T02TD2523E:133b-34: bskyed pa'i rim pas de rang gi gnas su sprul la sgo dbye ba byas te /
T02TD2523E:133b-36: aom badzra sa m'a ya dza: dza: dza: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2523E:133b-38: gsang sngags mngon par bya ste /
T02TD2523E:133b-40: rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-0: aom bha ga wa ti ru ru sphu ru dzva la @134a * //
T02TD2523E:134a-1: tishtha singbha lo tsa ni sarba aa rtha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-2: zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi yum gyi rig pa'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-3: aom dzi na dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-4: zhes pa ni rigs kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-6: aom sham ka re sh'intam ka re ghu ta ghu ti ni gh'u ta ya gh'a ta ya ghu ti ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-8: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te ka ro ta bi rye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-9: aom a'a ro li ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-10: aom ra tna dhrik sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-11: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134a-12: aom pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rigs so //
T02TD2523E:134a-13: so so'i rig pa dang snying po'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-14: de nas cod pan dang dar dbyangs bcing pa dang /
T02TD2523E:134a-15: go cha bskon pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2523E:134a-16: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2523E:134a-17: yongs su bzlas pas gus pas phyag byas la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2523E:134a-19: de nas phyir rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2523E:134a-20: dang por bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-21: tshim par bya ba'i phyir ni /
T02TD2523E:134a-23: dgongs par bya ba'i phyir ni rigs kyi sngags kyis so //
T02TD2523E:134a-24: 'byor par bya ba'i don du ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying pos bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-25: de ltar sbyin sreg byas nas /
T02TD2523E:134a-26: lhag par gnas par byas la /
T02TD2523E:134a-27: de nas mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod la /
T02TD2523E:134a-28: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grus kyi phyir gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD2523E:134a-29: gshegs su gsol bar bya ba'i phyir 'dis bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-30: aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02TD2523E:134a-31: dngos grub tshul bzhin stsal lags kyis //
T02TD2523E:134a-32: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD2523E:134a-33: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2523E:134a-34: de nas bsrung ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa la lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-35: de nas de nyid du ku sha bting la nyal par bya //
T02TD2523E:134a-36: de nas mal nas langs pa dang /
T02TD2523E:134a-38: spos chus lus kun dang gnas kun byugs la /
T02TD2523E:134a-40: bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134a-41: de nas gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD2523E:134a-42: rten la sogs pa bsams la /
T02TD2523E:134b-0: de'i 'og tu zangs ma'i snod la sogs par mchod pa la sogs bshams @134b te sngags kyis gdab po //
T02TD2523E:134b-1: de nas lha rnams dgug pa dang /
T02TD2523E:134b-4: dbang du byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134b-5: spyan drangs nas mchod pa dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2523E:134b-6: sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi sbyang ba byas la /
T02TD2523E:134b-7: de'i 'og tu d'u ra ba'i pir dang ;
T02TD2523E:134b-8: til mar gyi sbyang ba byas te /
T02TD2523E:134b-9: de'i sngags ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134b-10: dbang bskur ba'i cho gas khrus kyang gsol bar bya ste /
T02TD2523E:134b-11: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2523E:134b-12: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba //
T02TD2523E:134b-13: de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chus //
T02TD2523E:134b-14: dad pas khrus ni gsol bar bya //
T02TD2523E:134b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD2523E:134b-16: de nas na bza' dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2523E:134b-17: aom badzra bha sha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134b-18: de nas rgyan la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi sngags /
T02TD2523E:134b-19: aom badzra mu ku ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134b-20: zhes pa la sogs pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134b-21: de'i 'og tu dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2523E:134b-22: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02TD2523E:134b-23: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02TD2523E:134b-24: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02TD2523E:134b-25: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02TD2523E:134b-26: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2523E:134b-27: aa bhi shi nytsa sva m'am zhes pa dang /
T02TD2523E:134b-28: de bzhin du aom badzra satva h'um /
T02TD2523E:134b-29: badzra ratna tr'am: badzra dharma hr'i:/
T02TD2523E:134b-31: zhes bya ba thams cad la aa bhi shinytsa sva m'am zhes byas la /
T02TD2523E:134b-32: so so'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2523E:134b-34: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2523E:134b-35: dar dbyangs dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba la gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134b-36: de nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD2523E:134b-38: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:134b-39: de'i rjes su sngags 'dis gser ram rin po che'i thar ma la mig sman bskus la mig dbye bar bya'o//
T02TD2523E:134b-40: aom tsa kshu sa manta tsakashu bi sho dang ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:134b-42: aom di bya ai ni sa m'a dhi dhy'a n'am na nee sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:135a-0: sna tshogs pa la mchod pa'i sngags kyis @135a * //
T02TD2523E:135a-2: gong du gsungs pa'i bum pa rnams bu mo mdzes pa gzhon nu ma brgyad dam gcig gis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-3: de nas la lar slob ma dag gnas pa na yongs su gzung ba'i cho gas /
T02TD2523E:135a-4: slob ma bsnyen pa rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur la /
T02TD2523E:135a-6: de'i rjes la yang sreg blugs 'bum du tshang ba'am /
T02TD2523E:135a-7: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-8: de la dkyil 'khor gyi lha la ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-9: gcig la sogs pa rnams la ni sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor bris la bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-10: de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dang /
T02TD2523E:135a-11: sku gdung dang glegs bam thams cad la yang sangs rgyas thams cad pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba ste /
T02TD2523E:135a-12: de yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD2523E:135a-14: de yi bsdus pa de nyid do //
T02TD2523E:135a-15: gzhan du rab gnas thams cad la //
T02TD2523E:135a-16: sangs rgyas kun yum dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2523E:135a-18: de la sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02TD2523E:135a-20: rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02TD2523E:135a-21: sgo ba dang phyogs skyong du bcas pa'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-22: gtsug lag khang la ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs par ting nge 'dzin dang sngags 'dis bskyed do //
T02TD2523E:135a-23: aom h'um hr'i: su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:135a-24: aom h'um hr'i: bhr'um kham badzr'i bha ba dri dha tishtha bhr'um kham zhes bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-25: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de la bum pa lnga'am /
T02TD2523E:135a-26: bcu drug la sogs pa'i nang spos chus yangs su gang ba dag la mngon par bsngags pas bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135a-28: aom badzra da ka sarba shuddhe bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:135a-29: de'i rjes la gong ma'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo /
T02TD2523E:135b-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi @135b dbyings su gyur pa khang pa brtsegs pa chen po 'og min nas bkug ste /
T02TD2523E:135b-1: ngo bo nyid gcig par rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135b-2: de nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs byas la /
T02TD2523E:135b-3: gtsug lag khang gi srung ma panytsa ka'am /
T02TD2523E:135b-4: nag po chen po la sogs pa dgug pa'am /
T02TD2523E:135b-8: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya ste /
T02TD2523E:135b-9: ji srid gtsug lag khang gnas pa de srid kyi bar du khyod kyis srungs shig /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs shig ces bsgos la /
T02TD2523E:135b-12: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gnas pa yang /
T02TD2523E:135b-13: mchod pa legs par bya zhing bkrus la yi ge bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2523E:135b-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing /
T02TD2523E:135b-15: de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2523E:135b-16: khrus dang bkra shis dang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2523E:135b-17: sngags la sogs pa cho ga thams cad ni gong du gsungs pa dang mthun par bya ba nyid do //
T02TD2523E:135b-18: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2523E:135b-19: lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2523E:135b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam par yongs su gyur nas /
T02TD2523E:135b-21: kun rdzob dang don dam pa ston par byed par bsams la /
T02TD2523E:135b-22: aom pradzny'a sru tam smri ti ma ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:135b-23: zhes pa dang mdo sde la ni /
T02TD2523E:135b-24: aom s'u tra se na dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2523E:135b-25: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra thams cad bkug ste yi ge rnams la bstims nas /
T02TD2523E:135b-26: de nyid kyis sems can rnams la chos ston par rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:135b-27: gsang sngags kyi rgyud la ni /
T02TD2523E:135b-28: rdo rje chos yi ge'i gzugs su gyur pas sngags kyi gzugs kyi skrus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2523E:135b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2523E:136a-1: 'chang thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsams te /
T02TD2523E:136a-2: aom h'um hr'i: sarba gu hya dh'a tu ta /
T02TD2523E:136a-3: zhes pas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:136a-4: khrus la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2523E:136a-8: glegs bam la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2523E:136a-10: mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga la sogs pa ni sngar gsungs pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:136a-11: rdo rje la ni yongs su dag par khrus la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2523E:136a-12: lte ba la gnas pa'i h'um las /
T02TD2523E:136a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bskyed de /
T02TD2523E:136a-14: ting nge 'dzin gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes kyi rdo rje thams cad bkug pa de rnams nam mkha'i dkyil du padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa la gser gyi rdo rje chen po 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsams la /
T02TD2523E:136a-15: de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2523E:136a-16: ngo bo nyid gcig par bsams nas /
T02TD2523E:136a-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na badzra h'um /
T02TD2523E:136a-18: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la rab tu gnas par bya zhing /
T02TD2523E:136a-19: de'i lte ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:136a-20: dril bu rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2523E:136a-21: dril bu de aa dkar po las dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung chos kyi sgra chen por bskyed la /
T02TD2523E:136a-23: ting nge 'dzin gyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i bar snang la /
T02TD2523E:136a-24: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags padma chen po las /
T02TD2523E:136a-25: gsung gi sgra rgya mtsho ji snyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la /
T02TD2523E:136a-26: dam pa'i chos ston pa dang /
T02TD2523E:136a-27: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma nyes par byed pa'i rin po che dbyig gi dril bu rdo rje dang /
T02TD2523E:136a-28: padma mnyam par 'dus pa las byung ba'i gzugs kha dog dmar po 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsams te /
T02TD2523E:136a-29: de nyid lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas ngo bo nyid gcig pa las /
T02TD2523E:136a-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dzvi hva aa /
T02TD2523E:136a-31: zhes pas byin gyis brlab cing /
T02TD2523E:136b-0: de'i nang du aa las rdo rje bsrung ba kha dog dmar po @136b bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2523E:136b-1: phreng ba rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2523E:136b-2: rdo rje la sogs par rigs ji lta bu'i rim pa las shes par bya zhing /
T02TD2523E:136b-3: de nyid kyang bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar phreng ba'i mdo 'dzin bsams la /
T02TD2523E:136b-4: rang gi lha'i snying po gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2523E:136b-5: chos kyi gzungs chen po'i snying po /
T02TD2523E:136b-6: aom ma h'a padme dha ra ni zhes bya ba'i snying por bskyed de /
T02TD2523E:136b-7: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid mdun gyi nam mkhar bsams la /
T02TD2523E:136b-8: de nyid las bsrung ba'i snying po ni /
T02TD2523E:136b-10: de las rang gi 'dod pa'i lhar bsams nas /
T02TD2523E:136b-11: de nyid kyi bsrung ba'i sngags kyi yig 'bru rnams 'od zer dang bcas pa byung ba las /
T02TD2523E:136b-12: dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2523E:136b-13: snying po dang yi ge 'bru rnams phreng ba gzhan la bstim /
T02TD2523E:136b-14: rang gi lha nyid chos kyi gzungs chen por 'gyur ba las /
T02TD2523E:136b-15: mdo 'dzin la rab tu gnas par byas la /
T02TD2523E:136b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi brjed pa'i gzungs su gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2523E:136b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mh'a dharm'a aa mri te su pra tishtha badzre h'um /
T02TD2523E:136b-18: zhes pas rab tu gnas par bya'o ;
T02TD2523E:136b-19: / rdo rje la sogs pa la ni mchod pa dang /
T02TD2523E:136b-20: bkra shis la sogs pa ni snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya zhing /
T02TD2523E:136b-21: sku gzugs la sogs pa thams cad la ni /
T02TD2523E:136b-22: rab tu gnas pa med par ni zhag 'ga' yang gzhag par mi bya ste /
T02TD2523E:136b-24: gang du sku gzugs zin nas ni //
T02TD2523E:136b-25: yun rings gnas kyang ma mchod na //
T02TD2523E:136b-26: ji srid rab tu ma gnas par //
T02TD2523E:136b-27: de las mi shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2523E:136b-29: de bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis bsod nams thob par bya ba'i phyir myur du rab tu gnas par bya ba nyid do //
T02TD2523E:136b-30: de yi yo byad 'di dag ste //
T02TD2523E:136b-31: gang du rdzas ni nyams pa las //
T02TD2523E:136b-32: rdo rje slob dpon nyams gyur pas //
T02TD2523E:136b-33: de bas rdzas la rab tu 'bad //
T02TD2523E:136b-34: dar dang rna cha gdu bu dang //
T02TD2523E:136b-35: sor gdub rnams ni gser las byas //
T02TD2523E:136b-36: de nyid kyi ni gnas kyi phyir//
T02TD2523E:137a-0: @137a * // nang tshangs can stan khri dang bcas //
T02TD2523E:137a-1: de bzhin rgyab rten dag dang ni //
T02TD2523E:137a-2: gos bzang pos ni dgab par bya //
T02TD2523E:137a-3: sku gzugs la sogs dang por ni //
T02TD2523E:137a-4: gdan ni shin tu yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2523E:137a-5: mngon sum bya'am bsams nas ni //
T02TD2523E:137a-6: de steng bzhugs su gsol bar bya //
T02TD2523E:137a-7: steng du bla re bre bya zhing //
T02TD2523E:137a-8: sna tshogs gos la sogs pas brgyan //
T02TD2523E:137a-9: sa gzhi lhag par gnas bya bar //
T02TD2523E:137a-10: srad bu thod le kor dang bcas //
T02TD2523E:137a-11: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2523E:137a-12: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02TD2523E:137a-13: de bzhin nag po lnga dang yang //
T02TD2523E:137a-14: 'dir ni tshon ni bsdu bar gsungs //
T02TD2523E:137a-15: de la snod ni gang ba brgyad //
T02TD2523E:137a-16: bzhi'am gang yang yid kyis brtag /'bras dkar gyis ni bkang ba la //
T02TD2523E:137a-17: dbyig dag dang ni bcas par bya //
T02TD2523E:137a-18: bsang gtor mchod yon snod nyid dag / zangs ma las byas bum pa dang //
T02TD2523E:137a-19: so shing so phag dri zhim dang //
T02TD2523E:137a-20: pir ni dri ma sbyong byed pa //
T02TD2523E:137a-21: ba gcin lci ba 'o ma dang //
T02TD2523E:137a-22: zho dang mar sar ku sha'i chun //
T02TD2523E:137a-23: ba yi rnam lnga mnyam bsags la //
T02TD2523E:137a-24: snod gcig gi ni nang du gzhug / ljang dang dmar dang de bzhin ser //
T02TD2523E:137a-25: dkar dang nag po gnyis dag ste /
T02TD2523E:137a-26: srad bu lnga ni bsgril bar bya //
T02TD2523E:137a-27: mda' bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2523E:137a-28: til mar dri bzangs til mar nyid //
T02TD2523E:137a-29: sku gzugs sku dang mar me dag / bya ba'i phyir ni dbul bya zhing //
T02TD2523E:137a-30: me long shin tu dri med bsags //
T02TD2523E:137a-31: sku gzugs lhag par gnas pa la //
T02TD2523E:137a-32: ras ser bzang po kha tshar bcas //
T02TD2523E:137a-33: dri med rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD2523E:137a-34: aa gar nag pos legs bdugs pa //
T02TD2523E:137a-35: ser dang dmar dang nag dang sngo //
T02TD2523E:137a-36: dkar dang mkha' 'dra sngo ba sangs dang //
T02TD2523E:137a-37: de bzhin dkar po'i ba dan rnams //
T02TD2523E:137a-38: phyogs mtshams brgyad du gzugs par bya //
T02TD2523E:137a-39: dkyil 'khor lha yi grangs las ni //
T02TD2523E:137a-40: bum pa lhag par gnas bya'am //
T02TD2523E:137a-41: bcu'am brgyad dam lnga rnams ni //
T02TD2523E:137a-43: gos bzang sna tshogs mdog can gyis //
T02TD2523E:137a-44: bum pa'i ma gul pa dkri bar bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-0: gser ram yang na dngul dag @137b ni ;
T02TD2523E:137b-1: / dkyil 'khor phyogs su gzhag par bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-2: bri had kanda ka ri dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-3: ka ri ka ni sha sa mchog / danda autpala dkar po ste //
T02TD2523E:137b-4: sman rnams lnga po bsags nas ni //
T02TD2523E:137b-5: btags te mnyam par sbyar ba yi /
T02TD2523E:137b-6: sman rnams kun dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2523E:137b-7: de bzhin gshegs sngags bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2523E:137b-8: bum pa rnams su'ang gzhug par bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-9: rdo rje mthon ka bee d'urya //
T02TD2523E:137b-10: padma r'a ga rdo rje ste //
T02TD2523E:137b-11: 'di dag rin chen mchog gyur yin //
T02TD2523E:137b-12: med na tha mal pa yis bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-13: aa mu bil ba se'u star ga dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-14: gla gor zho sha dz'a ti dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-15: de la sogs pa gzhan rnams ni //
T02TD2523E:137b-16: sna tshogs sman ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-17: 'bras yos bzang po dag dang ni //
T02TD2523E:137b-18: yungs kar bzang po so sor dbul //
T02TD2523E:137b-19: zho mar 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-20: 'o ma can shing shing la sogs //
T02TD2523E:137b-21: me tog le brgan rtsi dag dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-22: bag zan las byas snum khur mchog / spyan 'byed kyi ni yo byad de //
T02TD2523E:137b-23: de dag so sor dbul bar bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-24: de bzhin khrus sa'i stegs bur ni //
T02TD2523E:137b-25: rin chen las byas khrus gzhong dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-26: so shing so phag phye ma dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-27: phag ze d'ur ba'i pir dag dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-28: ba yi rnams lnga cha mnyam dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-29: skyu ru la sogs 'dag cha la chu //
T02TD2523E:137b-30: sbrang rtsi dang sbyar mngar gsum chu //
T02TD2523E:137b-31: dri dang 'o ma'i chu rnams ni //
T02TD2523E:137b-32: bum pa re re dag tu bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-33: zhal long sku phyis ras yug dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-34: gu gul la sogs spos rnams dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-35: seng ldeng phur bu sngags gos dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-36: tshon skud lnga dang 'dab bzhi dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-37: tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-38: sbrang chu sug pa spos chu dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-39: til mar dang ni sran phye dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-40: 'bras chan chang bu gnyis dag dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-41: lha yi grangs dang rab sbyar ba'i //
T02TD2523E:137b-42: gur gum gyis bris lha yi mtshan //
T02TD2523E:137b-43: bris la bum pa gzhag par bya //
T02TD2523E:137b-44: gser las byas pa'i spu gri dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-45: de bzhin so mangs smad tsher dang ;
T02TD2523E:137b-46: / shel sgong dris bsgos rna cha dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-47: gser las byas pa'i thur ma dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-48: gser gyi 'khor lo dar dbyangs dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-49: gdugs dang rnga ma mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2523E:137b-50: seng ge'i khri dang ku sha dang //
T02TD2523E:137b-51: de bzhin yo byad ldan pa yis //
T02TD2523E:137b-52: rab tu gnas byas shis par 'gyur //
T02TD2523E:138a-2: mtshan mi shes pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD2523E:138a-3: rab tu gnas par byed pa ni //
T02TD2523E:138a-4: the tshom gyur pas gzhag bya min //
T02TD2523E:138a-5: de bzhin gshegs kun sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD2523E:138a-6: thugs kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems //
T02TD2523E:138a-7: yin pas gsal bar mi 'gyur bas //
T02TD2523E:138a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' rab gnas bya'o //
T02TD2523E:138a-9: de bzhin gshegs kun rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD2523E:138a-10: cho ga dri med byas pa las //
T02TD2523E:138a-11: bsod nams cung zad gang thob des //
T02TD2523E:138a-12: 'gro ba'i nyes kun dag gyur cig / rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2523E:138a-15: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra wa rma dang //
T02TD2523E:138a-16: lo ts'a ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
